snippet.title: Will give Pakistan 'tit for tat': Nitin Gadkari on Pathankot attack

localized.description:
Union Minister Nitin Gadkari lashed out at Pakistan on Monday, the third day of the ongoing encounter between security forces and terrorists at the Pathankot Air Force Base near the India-Pakistan border in Punjab.

Watch more videos: http://www.ndtv.com/video?yt

Download the NDTV news app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.july.ndtv&referrer=utm_source%3Dyoutubecards%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dyoutube
